    • Method Detail

      • addAirplane

        public boolean addAirplane(java.lang.String model,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String airlineName,
                           float cruiseSpeed,
                           float cruiseAltitude,
                           float maxRange,
                           java.lang.String airportCode,
                           int passengersCapacity,
                           int fuelCapacity)
        Receives all the data needed to create a new airplane and creates it Checking first if the airport and the airline connected to it are real
        Parameters:
        model - model of the airplane
        name - name of the airplane
        airlineName - airline that owns the airplane
        cruiseSpeed - cruise speed of the airplane
        cruiseAltitude - cruise altitude of the airplane
        maxRange - max range of the airplane
        airportCode - airport where the airplane will be parked at first
        passengersCapacity - passengers capacity of the airplane
        fuelCapacity - fuel capacity of the airplane
        Returns:
        returns false if the airline or the airport in question does not exist

        public void editAirline(java.lang.String oldName,
                        java.lang.String newName,
                        java.lang.String nationality)
        Receives the data possible to be edited on an airline and changes it using the class setters
        Parameters:
        oldName - previous name of the airline to match it in the ST
        newName - new name of the airline
        nationality - airline nationality

      • editAirplane

        public void editAirplane(int idAirplane,
                         java.lang.String model,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         float cruiseSpeed,
                         float cruiseAltitude,
                         float maxRange,
                         int passengersCapacity,
                         int fuelCapacity)
        Receives the data possible to be edited on an airplane and changes it using the class setters
        Parameters:
        idAirplane - id of the airplane to edit
        model - new model of the airplane
        name - new name of the airplane
        cruiseSpeed - new cruise speed of the airplane
        cruiseAltitude - new cruise altitude of the airplane
        maxRange - new max range of the airplane
        passengersCapacity - new passengers capacity of the airplane
        fuelCapacity - new fuel capacity of the airplane

      • mostPassengersAirport

        public static java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> mostPassengersAirport()
        Determines the airports wich had the most passengers passing through it
        Returns:
        returns the arraylist with all the matches for the most passengers passed through, can be more than one if the same ammount

      • mostPassengersFlight

        public static java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> mostPassengersFlight()
        Determines the flights with the most passengers transported
        Returns:
        returns the list with all the matches for the flight that transported most passengers, can be more than one

      • mostTrafficAirport

        public static java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> mostTrafficAirport()
        Determines the airports with the most traffic (number of flights)
        Returns:
        returns the list with all the matches for the most traffic airport, can be more than one with the same ammount

      • newFlight

        public void newFlight(BreadthFirstPaths bfs,
                      DijkstraSP dijkstraSP,
                      Date date,
                      int passengers,
                      Airplane airplane,
                      Airport airportOfOrigin,
                      Airport airportOfDestination,
                      int gIdAirportDest,
                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cons)
        Creates a new flight between two airports
        Parameters:
        bfs - - Breadth First Search object
        dijkstraSP - - dijkstraSP object
        date - - date of flight
        passengers - - passengers of flight
        airplane - - airplane used in the flight
        airportOfOrigin - - airport of origin the flight
        airportOfDestination - - airport of Destination the flight
        gIdAirportDest - - id will be used for search the hasPathTo in bfs and dijkstraSP algorithm
